message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, reflecting the increasing inflation for me and the slightly lesser inflation for you. This seems like a fair compromise.
Considering the inflation rates and previous offers, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. This aims to reflect the higher inflation rate for Bob while offering a reasonable amount for Alice.
